alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 12:55PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ascension, southwestern Livingston, east central Iberville and south central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 145 PM CDT... At 1254 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. Gabriel, or near Plaquemine, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, White Castle, Sorrento, French Settlement, Port Vincent, Old Jefferson, Geismar, Prairieville, Village St. George, Gardere and Carville. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 165 and 188. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; Western Ascension
